message: "This is nothing short of a modern day slave trade that preys on children and the most vulnerable among us and it must be shut down once and for all in New York and beyond," Governor Cuomo said.

data.description: Legislation Ensures Child Sex Trafficking Victims Will Not Be Required to Testify in Court in Order to Seek Justice.
data.title: Governor Cuomo Announces Multi-Prong Effort To Protect Children From Sex Trafficking
